DOC.brief_summary: This observational study cardiovascular risk factor arterial cardiac function subject overweight obesity . Subjects must 30 65 year age , body mass index > 27.0 kg/m2 free know heart disease digestive psychiatric disorder . Study aim include identify sex-differences traditional cardiovascular risk factor structural functional abnormality artery heart subject overweight obesity , influence physical fitness .
DOC.detailed_description: FATCOR observational study woman men overweight obesity . In particular prevalence conventional cardiovascular risk factor subclinical arterial cardiac dysfunction explore . The study aim identify sex difference presence cluster cardiovascular risk factor presence subclinical cardiovascular organ damage . The influence physical fitness factor also assess . All participant undergo extensive cardiovascular risk factor assessment include oral glucose tolerance test ambulatory blood pressure record . Subclinical cardiovascular dysfunction assess carotid femoral vascular ultrasound , echocardiography carotid-femoral pulse wave velocity use applanation tonometry . Physical fitness assess peak oxygen uptake maximal exercise test treadmill .
DOC.criteria: body mass index > 27.0 kg/m2 know heart disease digestive disorder psychiatric disorder unfamiliar Norwegian language
